original_text: But they forgot the Lord their God. And he sold them into the hand of Sisera, commander of the army of Hazor, and into the hand of the Philistines, and into the hand of the king of Moab. And they fought against them.
korean_text: 그들이 그들의 하나님 여호와를 잊은지라 여호와께서 그들을 하솔 군사령관 시스라의 손과 블레셋 사람들의 손과 모압 왕의 손에 넘기셨더니 그들이 저희를 치매

sentences.original_text: But they forgot the Lord their God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들은 자기들의 하나님 여호와를 잊었더라.

sentences.original_text: And he sold them into the hand of Sisera,
commander of the army of Hazor,
and into the hand of the Philistines,
and into the hand of the king of Moab.
